structure.unit: XI-F - Home Rule for Code Counties

law.catch_line: A code county may enact, amend, or repeal a public local law of that county by a resolution of the b...
law.text: A code county may enact, amend, or repeal a public local law of that county by a resolution of the board of county commissioners. The General Assembly may amplify the provisions of this section by general law in any manner not inconsistent with this Article.
